info.name: barnard59-ftp
info.description: FTP support for Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: List files (FTP)
operations.comment: Lists all files in the given FTP folder.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-ftp/list.js#default>
].

operations.label: Move file (FTP)
operations.comment: Moves the given file at the end of the stream processing and forwards any incoming data.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-ftp/move.js#default>
].

operations.label: Read file (FTP)
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-ftp/read.js#default>
].
